website_summaries.verdict: Softly-lined flannel pants make this long-sleeved set ideal for winter or kids who hate the chill of the AC.
pros: Several colors and patterns to choose from
Quality fabric that holds up well to washing
cons: Some may find the wide, athletic-style waistband uncomfortable in an otherwise loose-fitting set

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got my 11 yr old son the extra large since he is quite tall. They fit pretty good on him though the bottoms were just a touch big around the waste. He is tall and lanky. He told me these were the best pajamas he's ever had. They're definitely softer than those you get from say Walmart or Target.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin O

customer_reviews.title: Jammies
customer_reviews.text: A gift for grandson. They fit and his mum says he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit are great and my 10 year old grandson loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Scherff

customer_reviews.title: Overall fine
customer_reviews.text: These are fine. However, they say "Calvin Klein Underwear" on the shirt and waistband and my eleven year old was not particularly pleased about his pajamas saying underwear. I think just Calvin Klein would have been sufficient. Our six year old thought this was HILARIOUS. So four stars for that and for the fact they are really rather pricy for kids pajamas that say underwear. I get that they are a name brand, but for me it isn't worth the high cost of the pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy PJs
customer_reviews.text: I love Calvin Klein as a brand, and was excited to see these pajamas for my son. They are cozy and well-made, and I really liked the blue plaid on the pants. My son felt they were very comfortable, and they washed well. My son is a smaller 10-year-old, and these were pretty big on him. The tag says 10 to 12, so I would say either a large or 10-year-old or a smaller 12-year-old could wear them.
customer_reviews.author: DDC

customer_reviews.title: Good for Cold Nights
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and of an excellent quality. If you live somewhere that gets real winters, this is a great set of pajamas for your child. The waistband isn't too wide, and the cuffs on the legs are elasticized to stay put. I really like the color palette, and while these are billed as "boys" pajamas, my daughter is wearing these now. They look darling on her.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewToaKill

customer_reviews.title: nice pj's
customer_reviews.text: These jammies are nice and soft! The pants are a lightweight, cozy flannel and the top is a stretchy poly blend. They fit true to size and the waist on the pants is elastic. I didn't realize when ordering that the shirt says "Calvin Klein underwear" and of course my 10 year old thinks that's weird 🙄. He'll still wear them to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Reneerk

customer_reviews.title: Super soft material!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are super soft and very comfortable. Usually, I try to get clothing without tags as they tend to bother my kids, luckily not with these pajamas. The colors of the pajamas are just as they appear in the pictures. They have been worn and appear to wash wear without balling up or getting all wrinkly.
customer_reviews.author: VisualSol

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 year old that wears a small but is almost in a medium. I was sent a large, which I was fine with. Kids grow so fast! He will be in it in now time. He, of course, had to wear it to bed. It was big on him, which I expected. The quality of these is awesome! It is exactly as pictured and described. The fabric texture is really nice and soft. My son loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The best part of these pajamas is the bottoms. The fabric is so soft and the waistband is very stretchy and comfortable. I'd say that they run a bit large and I have no problem with that! The top is pretty standard. I do like these pajamas for 3/4 seasons, so that is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Books

customer_reviews.title: I don't even know what happened here!
customer_reviews.text: The PJ came. The only positive thing I can say is that the fabric is soft and pleasant to touch. Both top and bottom came in different sizes, not even the ones I ordered. The top tag says L. The pants tag states XL. They fit seemingly ok but too big. I am very disappointed. Wrong size, mismatched top and bottom parts.
customer_reviews.author: Gerbera_Reads

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and holds up well to laundering
customer_reviews.text: Very soft top and bottom, even after repeated washing and tumble drying. No piling on the pants yet and the graphic on the front of the shirt hasn’t begun to crack at all. The top feels just as soft and smooth as it did when we received it! Holds up very well to laundering. Fits 5’1, 100lbs sized person well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thrash

customer_reviews.title: Good pajamas for cool weather, true to size
customer_reviews.text: I like that this set of Calvin Klein pajamas has warm flannel pants and a long sleeve shirt. I received the size 12/14, and I gave them to my son who wears size 10/12. They were a little loose on him, but not too much. The pants have cuffs at the ankles that kept them from being too long. Really nice set for cool weather.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Even thought they're blue, the style seems girly. My daughter loves these. She thinks they're very comfortable and likes that they're not childish. They're really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable. Fit exactly as expected, which is surprising. PJs for some reason always are a size smaller than indicated. These aren't. Roomy and easy care.
customer_reviews.author: KJMReviews

customer_reviews.title: A little large
customer_reviews.text: These were a little large for my son, but he loves them anyway. They are soft and comfy like your favorite pair of pajamas. Perfect and great for every night.
customer_reviews.author: chicmama

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable sleepwear
customer_reviews.text: This pajama set is very soft and I love the blue plaid. The colors are bright and vivid and the fabric is soft and comfortable. My son likes this pajama set.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, warm pajama pants and a cute shirt. The color is very nice and the print quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CocoLoco

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are comfortable and fit well. They are not too heavy so they are perfect for cooler nights. The logo is huge.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and Heather Hejduk

customer_reviews.title: Soft PJs!
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are great--nice and soft! They do run a little large (length of the pants + waistband).
customer_reviews.author: C. Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice pajama set
customer_reviews.text: Nice CK pajama set. Well made. Quality fabric. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting Creek

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Boys' Little Kids 2 Piece Sleepwear Top and Bottom Pajama Set
product_meta.description: Your kid will lounge like a pro in our classic Calvin Klein pajama set. Designed for ultimate comfort and style. Relaxed fit. Features our signature Calvin Klein logo.
feature_bullets: Bottom features a wide elasticized waistband for extra comfort
Features our signature Calvin Klein logo
